name: Photogeist Album: Case 0
summary:
Join Tara Estelar on her debut adventure into the outskirts of the mysterious town of Stayfer River. Unwittingly embark on this mystery tour of an eccentric's farm to help solve the case of seemingly systematic sabotage that just might be steeped in the supernatural.

Use Tara's camera to view and photograph strange creatures named Geists. They don't always appreciate your presence though, so prepare for a fight!

Tara may choose to fight and Banish these terrifying anomalies or see the good in them and Appease them! You may find some things feel different depending on the paths you take...so choose wisely.

Capture and build your album of Geist photographs to delve deeper into the story behind their sudden appearance!

With the help of the overzealous Forest Ranger Elise, and her aloof sister Frankie, Tara seeks to understand the truth behind the unusual Geists.

Inspired by games such as "Pokemon Legends: Arceus", "Ape Escape", and "Megaman Legends", expect to play a relaxing quirky adventure that hearkens back to the era of N64 and PSX game design and visual style.
